description:
Packing for a weekend of hiking and trail running? Then you’re going to want to grab a pair of the Basin Trek shorts. Made from a quick drying nylon with a comfortable stretch, these shorts don’t shy away from creek crossings or scree scrambles.

  • Nylon blend has just enough spandex for an easy stretch
  • PFC-free DWR finish sheds light rain and shakes off bits of mucky trails that try and follow you home
  • Zippered fly makes it easier to answer the call of nature, especially if you have can of bear spray on your belt
  • Plenty of pockets space for the day’s necessities
  • Gusseted crotch helps the shorts move with you
name: Mountain Hardwear Basin Trek Short - Men's
